trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract definition of an action supported by the XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `operation` element enclosed by the `portType` element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> classe corresponde para o WSDL Web Services Description Language () `operation` elemento delimitados pelo `portType` elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL, consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a typical use of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra um uso típico de <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> classe.

trans-unit.source: The example takes a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> that does not have a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType> that supports the HTTP POST protocol.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> que não tem um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType> que oferece suporte ao protocolo HTTP POST.

trans-unit.source: It adds a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType> instance that supports POST, and writes out a new WSDL contract.
trans-unit.target: Ele adiciona um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType> instância que dá suporte a POST e grava um novo contrato em WSDL.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> class.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of faults, or error messages, defined by the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />.
A collection of faults, or error messages, defined by the current operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de falhas ou mensagens de erro, definidas pela operação atual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> to be checked to determine whether it matches with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> matches with the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> instance matches the <paramref name="operationBinding" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The following example demonstrates a typical use of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.IsBoundBy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra um uso típico de <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.IsBoundBy%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of instances of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Message" /> class defined by the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />.
The collection of instances of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Message" /> class defined by the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Message" /> classe definida por atual <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" />.

trans-unit.source: Because an <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> is associated with exactly one <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationInput> and exactly one <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationOutput>, only one instance of each can be a member of this collection, and thus the collection can have a maximum of two members.
trans-unit.target: Porque um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> é associado a exatamente uma <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationInput> e exatamente um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationOutput>, apenas uma instância de cada uma pode ser um membro dessa coleção e, portanto, a coleção pode ter no máximo dois membros.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of the elements contained in the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString" />.
An array of names of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de nomes de <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart" /> instâncias.

trans-unit.source: The elements of this array are identical to those of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString%2A> property, but housed in an array rather than a space-delimited string.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos dessa matriz são idênticos do <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString%2A> propriedade, mas hospedada em uma matriz em vez de uma cadeia de caracteres delimitada por espaço.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional Remote Procedure Call (RPC) signature that orders specification for request-response or solicit-response operations.
A list of names of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart" /> instances separated by a single space.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de nomes do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart" /> instâncias separadas por um único espaço.

trans-unit.source: The named <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> instances must adhere to the following rules:
trans-unit.target: Nomeado <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> instâncias devem seguir as regras a seguir:

trans-unit.source: The order of the named <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> instances reflects the order of the parameters in the RPC (remote procedure call) signature, which is the name of the operation, its input and output parameters, the results it returns and the exceptions it might be asked to handle.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos nomeado <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> instâncias reflete a ordem dos parâmetros na assinatura de RPC (chamada de procedimento remoto), que é o nome da operação, seus parâmetros de entrada e saídos, os resultados que ela retorna e pode ser solicitado para lidar com exceções.

trans-unit.source: The return value is not present in the list.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno não está presente na lista.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> name appears in both the input and output messages, it is an `in/out` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> nome aparece em ambas as mensagens de entrada e saídas, é um `in/out` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> name appears only in the input message, it is an `in` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> nome aparece somente na mensagem de entrada, é um `in` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> name appears only in the output message, it is an `out` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessagePart> nome aparece somente na mensagem de saída, é um `out` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Note that this parameter list is not required, even if the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> is to be used with an RPC-style <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>.
trans-unit.target: Observe que esta lista de parâmetros não é necessária, mesmo que o <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> deve ser usado com um estilo RPC <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>.

trans-unit.source: Do not call <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString%2A> directly.
trans-unit.target: Não chame <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrderString%2A> diretamente.

trans-unit.source: This method is only used internally for XML serialization.
trans-unit.target: Esse método só é usado internamente para a serialização de XML.

trans-unit.source: To return the parameter list use <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrder%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar o uso da lista de parâmetro <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.ParameterOrder%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> of which the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation" /> is a member.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType" />.

trans-unit.source: Operation_5#5
trans-unit.target: Operation_5 n º 5
